title: TrendingService

content: Dextools Trending Service , brought to you by the leading Crypto Digital Marketing AgencyWe'll get you trending on Dextools within a few hours. Trusted Service. Proof available.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I have talked with a couple of trending service providers, and most of them are fake and ask for payment first before work is done. Even they don't believe a trusted member of the forum. So what about you? Do you need upfront payment even for forum trusted users? Usually, I escrow funds for tasks like trending services. If work is done then I will release payment. Basically, I am looking for dextools trending or Pinksale trending service. But I can't pay upfront due to the high risk with the newbie's account. DM me on Telegram if you are a legit service provider.

comments.author: MOVEEARN DEV
comments.body: Quote from: TrendingService on June 01, 2022, 03:09:33 PMDextools Trending Service , brought to you by the leading Crypto Digital Marketing AgencyWe'll get you trending on Dextools within a few hours. Trusted Service. Proof available.We are currently only accepting ERC20 and BEP20 Projects and only book 2 projects a day, so contact us to book your slot.Other services available including PinkSale and CoinMarketCap Trending - See website for details or contact us on telegram. https://t.me/thetrendingservicebookingshttps://www.thetrendingservice.com/dextools-trending-service-hot-pairs.htmlScammers, we booked a Pinksale trend from them, After you pay them they stop responding and then Block you, here is the conversation we had.https://moveearn.io/docs/thetrendingservice.com/Here is a tweet from our twitter.https://twitter.com/MOVEearnToday/status/1536079958895828992after not getting any response we get this excuse from them.https://iili.io/h1PlXR.pngThey clearly state they require KYC or Audit for their service. and after you contact them, as you can see on the conversation. they happily take your money and stop responding.Then reply with that excuse.Their wallet barely has any TX, meaning they haven't scammed many people.Stay Away, Their proof is just retweets, claiming they are doing those services, they have Twitter comments disabled, and continue to use paid influencers to promote their service.We have contacted weebly, NameCheap to provide us with their details.ill keep you guys updated with any updates. STAY AWAY!

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Quote from: MOVEEARN DEV on June 12, 2022, 09:32:37 PMAlso is funny as you claim you promoted and on your last message your clearly stated that you "cannot promote."i have also video of all of this.$312 is nothing for me, but for others it is, what im trying to do here is for people to stay away from getting scammed by you.You know bro what were the funniest things? Let's point you something. 1. You didn't read my first reply, I asked him a few questions, and the OP hasn't given a proper answer. 2. You know very well trending isn't possible without KYC but still, you paid him, it's quite ridiculous, to be honest. 3. You haven't used any escrow service from the forum. This is funny for me, I am a Pinksale verified marketing partner and I am in the owner group as well. I know very well it's impossible to trend presale without KYC. Wondering how had you believed them? Anyway, I tagged the OP, because he is a scammer. Everyone knows it's not a possible trend without KYC hence he took the payment and refused to refund.
